resources.string:
A new Cadpage beta release is available. You can become a beta tester by choosing that option in the Cadpage information window of the Google Play Store app.
 
 The beta release is not currently supported by Active911. We expect this to be corrected in the next couple of weeks. But for now
 
 DO NOT BECOME A BETA TESTER IF YOU ARE RECEIVING ACTIVE911 ALERTS!!
